info.title: International Trade Administration Trade News & Articles
info.description: The Trade News & Articles API provides in-depth news and articles written by Trade Specialists working in the Federal government. The news and articles are categorized by industry, country, and topic area. Developers can use this API to provide exporters with the latest insights into their industry and into the countries with which they would like to do business.

parameters.description: The offset parameter defines the offset from the first result you want to fetch.
